Cableless Experience

Forget about complicated wiring typical for ECG Holter monitors

Simple Pricing

Starting from 19$ / patient / month. Extend your plan anytime you want

Health Report & Diagnosis

Aidmed Cloud has the capabilities for patient management, data visualization and autoscoring

How It Works

The moment the patient puts on Aidmed, the device immediately begins to gather biosignals. Through our mobile app, the data is fed directly into the Aidmed Cloud.

Consultation

After an in-depth medical interview, you equip the patient with Aidmed

24-Hour Measurement

The patient wears Aidmed comfortably at home while comprehensive set of various biosignals are automatically transferred to the Aidmed Cloud

Monitoring and Control

You have instant access to the patient’s data via tablet or a computer

About Aidmed

Aidmed's mission is to provide hassle-free diagnostic solutions in order to enhance access to specialized medical healthcare disregarding of patient's location. We provide physicians with all tools necessary for fast and easy ECG and HST diagnostics and 24/7 support.
